sentence: One of them, Milwaukee Bucks executive Alex Lasry, cited the attack on the Capitol this week as he laid out a policy proposal that would expand voting rights and end both the filibuster in the Senate and gerrymandering.
title: Biden gives Democrats the anti-Trump speech they've been waiting for
